title: BADecker
author: BADecker
content: Wow! Twitter isn't a place of leftist propaganda any longer. We can all talk and video there again. Watch the Rubin Report video. It shows a whole lot more than just this.Elon Musk Brings Back a Bunch of Huge Banned Twitter Accounts | Direct Message | Rubin ReportQuote from: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XnSWDhOhSQMDave Rubin of “The Rubin Report” talks about Elon Musk reinstating Donald Trump’s Twitter account; Elon Musk’s savage response to AOC’s tweet about the workers of Twitter; the ending of the Jordan Peterson’s Twitter ban; CBS News’ brief hiatus from Twitter due to Musk’s leadership; Adam Kinzinger telling CNN’s Jake Tapper conspiracies about why Elon Musk ended Donald Trump’s Twitter ban; the end of Bob Chapek ruining Disney as he has been fired and replaced by Bob Iger; Dave Portnoy explaining to Tucker Carlson how Sam Bankman-Fried used FTX and Alameda Research to fund Democrat donations to help write crypto regulations; Klaus Schwab telling the crowd at the B20 summit how society needs to be restructured; how the Oregon mask mandate may become permanent; how China’s zero-COVID policy is creating a dystopia; the G20’s  push for vaccine passports for travel; Giorgia Meloni’s takedown of Emmanuel Macron’s exploitation of African nations; and much more.Elon Musk Brings Back a Bunch of Huge Banned Twitter Accounts | Direct Message | Rubin Reporthttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XnSWDhOhSQM

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on November 22, 2022, 10:22:50 PMWow! Twitter isn't a place of leftist propaganda any longer. We can all talk and video there again. Watch the Rubin Report video. It shows a whole lot more than just this.The claim that Twitter was used for political cause by the leftist is debatable. Twitter had a policy and every user must abide by it and violation of these rules attracts deserved sanctions.Elon Musk is a businessman that is driven by profit and power. These top class CEOs cannot be trusted because they can be influenced by government. There is no guarantee that Twitter under Musk would promote freedom of speech and expression. There is no prove that the current leadership of Twitter would not silence opposition and promote inequality among users. Lets seat back and watch what would happen in the nearest future. I am sure that in few years a certain group would claim that Twitter is silencing them

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: Die_empty on November 23, 2022, 05:12:22 PMQuote from: BADecker on November 22, 2022, 10:22:50 PMWow! Twitter isn't a place of leftist propaganda any longer. We can all talk and video there again. Watch the Rubin Report video. It shows a whole lot more than just this.The claim that Twitter was used for political cause by the leftist is debatable. Twitter had a policy and every user must abide by it and violation of these rules attracts deserved sanctions.Elon Musk is a businessman that is driven by profit and power. These top class CEOs cannot be trusted because they can be influenced by government. There is no guarantee that Twitter under Musk would promote freedom of speech and expression. There is no prove that the current leadership of Twitter would not silence opposition and promote inequality among users. Lets seat back and watch what would happen in the nearest future. I am sure that in few years a certain group would claim that Twitter is silencing them  Well, of course there isn't any guarantee that twitter will always be this way or that. But for the moment, twitter is opening up to freedom.Could say it simple like this. Before Musk twitter was turning into Democrats/socialism/Communism/anti-American/anti-freedom. After Musk twitter has become Republican/American-freedom/the-American-dream.In the future, there absolutely will be silencing of the opposition, and inequity among users. But it will be done from the outside... vast numbers of average freedom-loving people out-talking the slave makers... rather than the slave-makers censoring freedom-loving people, as it was before Musk.

comments.author: Gyfts
comments.body: Elon Musk open to offering amnesty for banned accounts: https://twitter.com/elonmusk/status/1595473875847942146QuoteShould Twitter offer a general amnesty to suspended accounts, provided that they have not broken the law or engaged in egregious spam?Suspended accounts pre-Musk could've been banned for whatever arbitrary reason and the ban appeals process was nonsense. Clear double standard in enforcing Twitter rules which invalidate some number of suspensions. Though, Elon said he wouldn't bring Alex Jones back. I find Alex Jones distasteful, but he never broke any laws.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: You guys see the closet full of #staywoke T-shirts that Elon found in the Twitter headquarters?  Elon taking over Twitter was so badly needed.  The way liberals have taken over media to push their ridiculous agendas has been shocking to me.  By at least restoring free speech Elon is allowing regular people to push back against the crazies.  The fact that the people saying to trust the science are the same ones saying you can't determine if a skeleton is male of female because you can't ask them is alarming.  The fact that government is fostering this sort of mental illness shows that they don't care about their citizenry.  They only want to foster mental illness and weaken the next generation so they will be easier to control.  Thank God for Elon.  He's restoring balance to a small piece of media and even that tiny victory is met with outcries.

comments.author: LTU_btc
comments.body: Personally, I don't like direction where most of media and social networks is going. But what Elon is doing with Twitter doesn't makes me happy. It's not about freedom of speech or similar stuff. Every place should have at least some regulations, otherwise it will turn into trash bin. And worst part that he is selective and don't apply same rules for everyone. He unbanned Trump, but as said above, he won't do it for Alex Jones (as much as I don't like him). How it's better than leftists who controlled Twitter.I'm not even talking about such things like buying verified badge for $8. Probably I don't have to remind how many huge scams were made with it, don't even talk about fakes.

comments.author: philipma1957

Probably I don't have to remind how many huge scams were made with it, don't even talk about fakes.Free speech is bullshit internet made it far far far far far too easy to spread lies and hate.Both far left and far right groups just say bs filled with hate.See you have fallen into the trap of picking the right over the leftguess what picking the left over the right means you also fall into the trap.Sorry you don't walk the line I do.ie right and left both suck so side with neither.pick and choose each and every issue separately and especially rule out all left and right influences.

comments.author: sirazimuth
comments.created_time: November 25, 2022, 05:49:54 AMLast edit: November 25, 2022, 04:06:08 PM by mprep

And I almost bought a Tesla Model 3 for some bitcoin. Thank goodness I came to my senses and did due diligence on this moron.You should too. He is a billion dollar fraud who plays his credulous minions like a violin. Apparently, you are one of them. I just try to ignore it all and post some rabbit hole nonsense to make everyone say WTF?I hate this system bigly. But I have watched it for over 50 years and it simply goes on and on. I have far left and far right friends.  They actually think one side is good and one is evil.Sad so sad.BTW I post on yahoo much the same.here is one now."No Pork liked your comment on Texas 'Anti-Woke' Bank Goes Bust In 3 MonthsPHIL - Fri 25 Nov 2022 02:39:11 PMSo called anti woke bank is and was a con to lift right wing blue collar money. Basically 20% of the Republican Party are robbing the other 80%. That 80% getting robbed would be what Hillary calls deplorable. Donald Trump called some of them (dead veterans) suckers and losers.Unfortunate that Trump is correct as I could bet the universe that people will disagree and argue with this post. Note I am not pro Hillary or pro Biden or Pro or anti Trump. I just call this the way I see it. Lets see how many go thumbs down and prove my point."

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: sirazimuth on November 25, 2022, 05:49:54 AM I used to be big Elon Musk fan. And I almost bought a Tesla Model 3 for some bitcoin. Thank goodness I came to my senses and did due diligence on this moron.You should too. He is a billion dollar fraud who plays his credulous minions like a violin. Apparently, you are one of them. Wake up my friend.Even if I don't like the the personality of Elon Musk, I don't think it will stop me from buying a Tesla if I like it, my personal opinion though, you are not wrong to have yours. On the issue of Elon Musk bringing back a bunch of banned accounts, I think it was always expected, the last management where the ones who placed those accounts on ban, there's a new management now under Elon Musk, and it is logical to think that he reviews those accounts under his new terms and conditions.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: These are crazy attempts to inflate the number of users, given that these banned accounts are mostly Fake accounts, and most of the time they have abused the platform according to the specified conditions. It is most likely that he wanted to restore the accounts of public figures such as Trump, and in order for the decision not to appear as if it was taken for the sake of Trump’s eyes, it would be in the form of a wave of blocking an entire batch of accounts.I have an account that was registered years ago, and I do not know the reason until now, but I wish it would come back to me, by the way. lol

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on November 22, 2022, 10:22:50 PMWow! Twitter isn't a place of leftist propaganda any longer. -cut-it never was leftist as human rights shouldn't be lefitist issue. And if you think otherwise you are just mislead. Elon's "comedy is legal in twitter again" is very telling when the issue was that it was never illegal, he just wasn't funny to begin with. And people who spread hate speech like they would were working for nazi-germany, is somehow comedy to him is troubling to say the least.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: o48o on November 25, 2022, 11:40:24 PMQuote from: BADecker on November 22, 2022, 10:22:50 PMWow! Twitter isn't a place of leftist propaganda any longer. -cut-it never was leftist as human rights shouldn't be lefitist issue. And if you think otherwise you are just mislead. Elon's "comedy is legal in twitter again" is very telling when the issue was that it was never illegal, he just wasn't funny to begin with. And people who spread hate speech like they would were working for nazi-germany, is somehow comedy to him is troubling to say the least.The point is this...Twitter was and is a world-renowned media center.When they block a sitting US President - Trump - because of their politics, they're probably illegal, but for sure in extremely bad taste. But the focus isn't only Trump. The focus is the blocking of all kinds of things that were different than their political and propaganda opinion. And there would be nothing wrong with this, if they had not become world-renowned first.Musk has taken twitter out of the form of the propaganda machine that it was. He has opened it up to free speech, at least a whole lot more. That's the American way in the media.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on November 25, 2022, 11:54:06 PM-cut-When they block a sitting US President - Trump - because of their politics, they're probably illegal, but for sure in extremely bad taste. -cut-They blocked Trump because he was throwing fuel in to flames during January 6th Capitol attack. They didn't block him because of his politics, as those have never changed from the beginning. They banned him because his fueling of treasonous mobs was a national crisis and huge attact to everything US stands for. They were attacking to the heart of united states just because democracy didn't suit them anymore. People got killed and Trump was acting as their cheerleader. And i not sure what you mean probably illegal, whose actions?

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: You can become an angel for a triggered lib for just $8 a month. Help a helpless progressive get they/their blue check today. Lol. Sponsor A Liberal For Just $8 A Monthttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WoG3e7MI34Q

comments.author: Popkon6
comments.body: As far as I know Twitter accounts that band are bot accounts.  And Elon Musk seems to be doing the Twitter KYC system.  A KYC system will be very good because the owner accounts will be fine and the rest of the bot accounts will be suspended.

comments.author: Maestro75
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on November 23, 2022, 10:35:16 PMWell, of course there isn't any guarantee that twitter will always be this way or that. But for the moment, twitter is opening up to freedom.This is what social media should be, freedom. It should not be like the controlled press and media houses which have continued to act partial and one sided as many of their staffs take sides on issues to the disadvantage of another. What Elon has done is right. It should be applauded and not condemned. Unbanning Donald Trump's account is the best decision ever. Maybe that was the major reason why Elon even got interested in Twitter and bought it.

comments.author: Newlifebtc
